content: big fan of dolphins not a big fan of sewing here you have a quick pattern for a small no sew dolphin you can work it with fine yarn and make a cute keychain out of it or with bulkier yarn to make a soft dolphin plushie the finished object is around 10cm long and 4cm wide it is worked with velvet fine yarn and a 3mm hook but you can use any size and type of yarn that you prefer and the final dimensions may vary according to your specific yarn type happy crocheting ___________ contains - **desktop version** 2 pdfs with pictures in english and italian - ️**printable version** 1 pdf without pictures to print 1 pdf pictures only as reference for the printed one i d love to see your plushies share a photo on instagram tagging me @dragonsyarn ___________ pattern design © 2023 susanna berra dragon s yarn all rights reserved the pattern is for personal use only do not sell or reproduce the pattern or parts of it you can sell items made from this pattern as long as they are handmade by yourself in limited number and you give me credit as the designer susanna berra dragon s yarn - @dragonsyarn
